p: We also examined the activity of KPF1-Antx hMAb to protect (prophylactic) and treat (therapeutic) pH1N1-infected guinea pigs, as well as to prevent direct contact transmission ( Figure 4 and Figure 5, respectively). KPF1-Antx hMAb showed potent prophylactic and therapeutic activity against pH1N1 infection in guinea pigs ( Figure 4 and Figure 5, respectively), consistent with its in vitro antiviral and HAI properties. Moreover, administration of KPF1-Antx hMAb blocked transmission of pH1N1 infection to sentinel guinea pigs from direct contact with infected animals ( Figure 4 and Figure 5, respectively).
